description: '''Jaja Gha'is Robinson''' (born October 9, 2000), known professionally as '''Ghais Guevara, Goyard Ibn Said''' and '''Jaja00''', is an American rapper, [[record producer]] and political activist from [[Philadelphia]]. Robinson entered the music scene in 2019 under the alias Jaja00. He garnered attention as Ghais Guevara with the release of his mixtape, ''BlackBolshevik'' on April 17, 2021. Guevara is known for his bold expression of geopolitical [[Communism|communist]] ideologies in his lyrics.
